content: the tea cosy features squishy cables with intermediate knitters in mind this cable pattern features both cable stitches and twisted stitches the tea cozy will be perfect to use for afternoon tea or to give as a gift yarn 1 x the petite wool in the color natural 3 5oz/100g/153yds/140m yarn weight - bulky/chunky/12 ply needles pair of 6mm us 10 knitting needles cable needle skills level intermediate this is an intermediate-level knitting pattern and the techniques involved are the knit stitch purl stitch twisted stitches tw2f and tw2b cable stitches and decreases to shape sizing the cozy will fit over a teapot that measures around 18″ circumference don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern or any items created using the directions in this pattern without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information 1 https //www handylittleme com/teapot-cozy-knitting-pattern/ 2 https //www handylittleme com/product/cable-knit-tea-cosy-pattern-pdf/
